title: Activity System Analysis-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Online Lecture Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in offline course design and ability to use basic digital educational tools
context.additional_context: Short intensive training course focusing on converting existing in-person lectures into effective online courses for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can restructure face-to-face lectures into online-compatible formats using the Activity System Analysis Model.
Propose at least three effective interaction design strategies for limited technological environments (smartphone-centric).
Develop summative assessment tools applicable to simulation/VR-based learning environments and integrate them into a comprehensive evaluation system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
